segments.text: Are you ok ? You seem a bit anxious .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I'm OK , I have been having a lot of mood swings lately . I think it has to do with the pills my doctor prescribed that are causing chaos on my hormones .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you mean you feel ecstatic one minute and then blue the next ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , it's weird . For example just this morning I was feeling detached and lonely , even though there was really no reason to feel that way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , maybe your mood will swing positively and you will feel confident , brave and hopeful !
segments.speaker: S1
